Detailed Description

Blocks are solid, nonmoving bits of terrain.

Return the location of the vertex in the block's polygon that is furthest in the given direction.

def block.Block.getBounds (   self  ) 

Get our bounding polygon.

We assume that blocks don't move once created, so their bounding rectangles are fixed.

Member Data Documentation

block.Block.orientation

There are currently 20 different block orientations, most of which have a square collision polygon.

block.Block.sprite

To allow blocks to be animated, we use Sprites for drawing them.

block.Block.terrain

TerrainInfo instance to let the block know what it looks like.
